document.masterDocTitle: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species

Ecological notes : very common in broad-leaved and mixed woodland and conifer plantations; sandy heathland; lakeside marsh with scrub; fen; formal garden with wooded fringes and lake; grassland (including calcareous). iv–v.
